mapper.select: select f.id, f.file_name as fileName, f.file_size as fileSize, f.file_path as filePath, f.file_status as fileStatus from tbl_file f inner join tbl_board_file bf on f.id = bf.id where bf.board_id = #{boardId}
select id, file_name as fileName, file_size as fileSize, file_path as filePath from tbl_file where id = #{id}
